ad_text: Northern Hardwoods Sponsored We are looking for a Shipping Specialist to join our team in Niles, MI! Northern Hardwoods Sponsored Northern Hardwoods Lumber has an immediate opening for an experienced truck driver at its Sawmill located in Newberry, Michigan! The Lumber Truck Driver loads/unloads and hauls wood products from production sites to customers / green yard in a safe and legal manner following company, local, state and DOT laws and guidelines. We would love to have you join our team. Apply now
